name: BERSERKER COMMANDER

traits.name: Bloodied Frenzy
traits.text: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The berserker makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Javelin in any combination.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Thunder damage to the target or another creature within 5 feet of the target.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the berserker's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Frenzied Rush
bonus_actions.text: Each ally within 30 feet of the berserker can take a Reaction to move up to half the ally's Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The berserker can also move up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
